meanings.definition: The emission of light from a material when an electric current is passed through it.
meanings.sent1: The electroluminescence of the screen made the room glow softly.
meanings.sent2: The electroluminescence of the LED bulb brightened the dark hallway.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat was fascinated by the electroluminescence of the TV screen.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like electroluminescence in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The electroluminescence of the fireflies in the garden was enchanting.

meanings.definition: The process of producing light by the passage of an electric current through a substance.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study electroluminescence to understand how light is created.
meanings.sent2: The electroluminescence of the neon sign caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The party was dull until the electroluminescence of the disco ball started.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas sparked like electroluminescence in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The electroluminescence of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
